Name: Lovelight
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and square of dark chocolate.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: Reminiscent of a cognac-based Negroni with a hint of cinnamon spice.
History: Created in 2015 by John Stavroulakis at Zaxari kai Alati Bistrot Bar in Athens, Greece
Nutrition: One serving of Lovelight contains 169 calories
